name: Heavy Mustard: A County Fair Hotdog Simulation
name_original: Heavy Mustard: A County Fair Hotdog Simulation
description:
Apply mustard with exact precision at the county fair on hundreds of available hotdogs.

Click and drag the mouse on The Hand to grab the Mustard Sauce Teat from the Sauce Udder.

Move Mouse to spread Mustard.

Press the Red Button for More Hotdog, and to Reset.

Press the Yellow Button for ???

Made for TeamDogpit's SimJam!
with Hand from the awesome MathUtilities from Johnathon Selstad
